pages.text: I have read multiple stories from many places all talking about a single cataclysm, occurring slowly, centuries before now. I have also had multiple nightmares of someone taking great actions to preserve their position in society, that impact the world in the same ways mentioned in the stories. $(br2)I can only wonder if these nightmares are actually
memories, and if I had some large part to play in this chaos. If so, I must learn the true causes of these events, so that I can avoid making the same mistakes again.
